name: XinFin Network
description: XinFin (XDCE) describes itself as an enterprise-ready hybrid Blockchain technology company optimized for international trade and finance. The Xinfin network is powered by the native coin called XDC. The XDC protocol is architected to support smart contracts, KYC, and masternodes. The XDC Chain (XinFin Digital Contract) uses XinFin Delegated Proof of Stake (XDPoS), with the goal of creating a 'highly-scalable, secure, permissioned, and commercial grade' blockchain network. Tradefinex.Org is a network for trade finance originators to distribute trade assets to alternative asset investors using decentralized and p2p financing technology.
